산지 좀 됬는데 이거 개꿀잼임 살인마 엄청 재밌어져서 ㅎㅎ 오후 3시에는 게임 안잡히고 새벽 3시에 큐 엄청 잘잡히는게 조금 흠 ㅋㅋ
If you like jump scares and hanging teenagers on meathooks this game is for you.

-Pieno di bug, hitbox e collisioni fatti così male che nemmeno agli albori dei videogames si vedevano cose del genere;
-perk salvavita che non funzionano
-armadietti ed alberi che spawnano vicino alle finestre o ai pallet e che ti fanno puntualmente ammazzare
-movimenti dei personaggi così legnosi che Steve di Minecraft sembra un contorsionista in confronto, 
- pieno di cheaters, di Vpn users e di gente che viene da altri continenti che laggano all'inverosimile. 
-devs totalmente menefreghisti del parere della community 
Il tutto ben condito con un desync tale che non si spiegherebbe nemmeno se i servers stessero sulla luna.
Ecco a voi Dbd signori, l'unico gioco in cui quando i devs rilasciano una nuova patch l'intera community deve pregare il signore in ginocchio affinché non abbiano fatto troppi casini.

игра интересная но требует достаточно большого ума и долгих разберательств кто  что и  как  делает извеняюсь за отсутствие знаков припенания
好玩，但排隊時間有點久（鬼太少？）
Some killers could be nerfed (doctor, plague, and buba) aside from that the game is fun.

생존마는 너무 잔인하다. 암튼 생존자를 주로하는데 발전기 돌면 살인자 보이는 퍽 껴서 살인자 랑 제일 먼 발전기 돌릴러 가기 떄문에 생각보다 살인자는 거의 겜 끝날 떄 정도에만 많이 만난다는 것?! 하지만 살인자를 하면 생존자에게 두들겨 맞는것 ㅠㅠ (올 생존일때가 많다)17~15랭 + 부캐 저주할거야 . 하지만 20~18랭 같은 뉴비들 만나면 학살 가능하다는? 거의 3명 죽이고 한명은 살려주는 스타일~
非常好玩 但是希望 模型贴图 再精致一点 增加恐怖感 和氛围

é basicamente um jogo pra você passar estresse e continuar jogando porque viciou. O balanceamento não é um dos melhores, no entanto as partidas valem a pena e é um jogo divertido (Pelo menos em uma parte do tempo).
I honestly love this game and in two weeks have played 220 hours, i'm down right addicted. If you like anything horror, this is the game for you

PROS
features new game breaking bugs every month.
can spend real life money for several sets of pants with a slightly different shade of blue or brown
hit validation 
game will randomly crash, to prevent you from playing it further
keyboard warriors in post game chat
endless grinding which achieves 0


CONS
Your wage must exceed 500k a year to purchase all in game items


Another money farm with 1000s of items of purchase and no care into the development/maintenance of the game itself.
Don't worry though there is only a 90% chance the thing you paid for won't work. But the devs will devote at least a whole 2 hrs to make a fix which will be released weeks later and then break some other thing/s you have paid for.

I cannot stress this enough, only purchase on sale or try it on a free weekend (free on game pass)

The gameplay and mechanics are fun for a time BUT ONLY BECAUSE no other game does something like this.
its pretty fun, especially when you play with friends.

Gr8 game, but ranking system sux.
Why tf will i need to fight with 2 red and 2 purple rank while I'm only r14 billy??
Very fun game! Nothing beats getting 4 tea-bagging survivors and killing them all!
Fantastic game to play with friends or alone

I like this game, I really do, but it is hard to recommend to other people.  I played this on PS4 back in the day with some friends, I never got it on PC because all the reviews say it is a toxic community. After about 6 months I'm mulling it over I finally decided to buy it. I do have fun with the game, but now that I am killer rank 15, I get matched with people around rank 6 to 9 all the time and yeah everyone is right about the toxic community. Bad matchmaking and toxic player base means I cannot recommend this. Very fun game if you do have a group of friends to play with though.

It's like Left4Dead but opposite. Instead of going head first guns blazing into hordes of enemies, you spend all your time running away from one guy.

Really fun if you don't care much about winning and more about having a thrill. If you are the salty kinda person though, this is more than fun, this is the well where many of you fall and don't even try to escape.
SJADJSJ me asusto mas que la ctmr pero ta weno

The game is relatively easy to get into, hard to master. There is a meta and requires a lot of practice the more you climb the ranking system (which you are inevitably forced to play). Also, certain perks are hidden behind a pay wall which you still have to level up the killer, unlock the perk (so you can unlock said unique perk for other killers), and then unlock the perk (for other killers). The game has a ton of grinding to unlock perks that are meta. Despite this, I enjoy the H-E double hockey stick out of this game! 

The community is more nice than mean (there are jerks and groups that bm). It can be mildly frustrating at times. But, be up for the challenge if you are up against a group of friends or an absurd killer. 

Good luck and have fun with this thrilling game!

作为我入手的第一款steam游戏，我个人还是很推荐这款游戏的。《黎明杀机》开创了崭新的1v4玩法！从16年什么都不懂的小萌新到现在的中等玩家，这期间除了苦逼的单排也让我在网上社交了不少好友。这游戏比较肝，在一开始的时候也对萌新很不友好，但只要上手了也会比较喜欢。（比如玩人就你没跑出去，玩屠被溜得不能自理。时不时队友再卖卖你啥的，《全面生气》果然不是盖的！）。除了技术外，这游戏也涉及了很大的运气成分，运气好地窖刷脸，运气差你就算有钥匙都跑不掉！现在就是希望ZZZ能先把部分大型的BUG（比如货币同步错误，段位更新失败）修一下，小BUG就随意了，毕竟无BUG不杀机！

At 13 hours now, I absolutely love this so far. The community can be a bit toxic, but just ignoring those solves that issue. Some great rounds, tense matches, and legit jump scares can be found even if you`re playing solo. The only complaints I`ve got is really just the animations. It`s a serious nitpick but if I`m honest I`d spend a bit of time smoothing out a few animation glitches or working on character model interactions. But again, that doesn`t affect the amount of fun I`ve gotten out of this. Give it a whirl for two or three matches then refund if you don`t enjoy it, I think it could be worth your time to try out.
incredibly addicting and fun when you learn the technical side of a strategic game

Nossa, o que falar sobre esse jogo. Apenas, gostei muito: nota 0.

These shit devs are killer mains. They are slowly but surely changing the way the game works to benefit the killer. Absolute trash.
jogo é bem divertido, principalmente se vc tiver amigos pra jogar.
ta weno pero plw arreglen los bugs y supporteen más a win7 >:c
o jogo não abriu, mas acho q e pq meu pc é ruim :/ mas eu sei q é bom

Si bien, el juego es bastante bueno, tanto a nivel de apartado gráfico, simplicidad de este (que luego de 1 o 2 partidas ya entiendes que debes hacer para ganar),variedad de personajes (tanto de asesino como superviviente/skins), e implementan una forma rápida de poder subir de nivel (presten atención) los PERSONAJES, es muy dificil poder comprar a través de la moneda del juego a los personajes del tipo desbloqueable (tanto asesino como superviviente). Esto lo digo con certeza, pues ya llevo un total de 45 horas de juego mas o menos, y ya sobre el nivel 35 de cuenta, recién conseguí mas o menos unos 6000 puntos, donde necesitas unos 9000 para comprar 1 SOLO PERSONAJE, de los 32 desbloqueables (hay 3 monedas en el juego, 2 para skins/personajes (una imposible de obtener a través del juego mas que pagando, y la otra solo obteniendo luego de subir niveles de cuenta), y una para subirles el nivel  a los personajes). Destacar también que hay personajes que solo pueden ser comprados. Recomiendo ampliamente que si compras este juego, compres la versión mas completa, de modo que tengas mas variedad de personajes, ya que es MUY DIFÍCIL obtenerlos de forma convecional.

Somehow, most Killers go straight to where I'm hiding, despite the fact that I am not running or bleeding. Not at all fun, as 95% of games have the same outcome. I am not so inexperienced a gamer to the point of having such difficulty. If I could expect a 40-50% win rate, the game might be enjoyable. Infuriating, disappointing game. NOT WORTH BUYING. 1/5.

dead by daylight ou le jeu qui m'a fait le plus ragé des derniers mois et que j'ai le plus adoré !
Ce jeu est incroyable mais entre les joueurs toxique ou les tueurs toxique et les cheater on peut
rapidement en avoirs marre sans oublier les problème d'équilibrage  !
En dehors de ses 4 problèmes le jeux est simple à prendre en main et addictif et pas tellement flippant
le jeu tourne plutôt bien quand les devs décide de pas tous casser à chaque mises à jour !
Les tueurs sont vraiment variés et les styles de jeu peuvent changer totalement dépendant de vos compétence
je n'est jamais eu l'impression de jouer 2 tueurs identique à la différence du gameplay des
survivant qui est plus ou moins la même chose à chaque fois ! 

Mais de manière global ce jeu me tapais dans l'œil depuis longtemps et je mis suis tenté et je suis maintenant conquis sont pris avec les dlc est peut-être cher mais le jeu et les dlc sont si souvent en
réduction que ce n'est pas gênant !
Donc si vous êtes prêt à attendre un peux pour une réduc et que vous aimez les jeux de ce genre alors sauter dessus !

Es un juego demasiado buenísimo eh, te diviertes muchísimo ya sea como el asesino o el sobreviviente, el precio es un poco elevado pero aveces sale en oferta y lo podeis comprar y las colaboraciones que tienes con asesinos son muy buenas ya sea de Halloween, jigsaw, elm street o también de strangers things es buenísimo la verdad lo recomiendo bastatnte y si lo comprais disfrutad y pasale la voz a vuestros amigos
this game is really fun when you play with friends. I'd recommend playing both killer and survivor cause it will help you get better as a player. Watch out for the salty/toxic people haha smileW
